english.segment1: Vattnet svart. Som mnen full. Varm nattbris viskar. Att jag r naken och ny
english.segment2: Water black. As the moon is full. Warm nightbreeze whispers. I'm naked and new
english.segment3: I know You're always throwing kisses from the sky. Tonight I caught one. Sixteen years old. I dare to swim further out. I know You're always throwing kisses from the sky. Tonight I caught one
english.segment4: Som om man kunde. Vidrra lycka. Jag virar den runt mig. Som en filt. Det r bara Du, jag och mnen
english.segment5: Like joy was something you could touch. I wrap it around me. Like a blanket. It's just You, me and moon
english.segment6: I know You're always throwing kisses from the sky. Tonight I caught one. Sixteen years old. I dare to swim further out. I know You're always throwing kisses from the sky. Tonight I caught one.
